entries.title: How Fixing Notifications Changed My Relationship With My Phone
entries.description: Culling notifications, batching alerts and disabling red badges quelled the madness.

entries.title: Tech-Industry Layoffs Unwind Headcount Growth
entries.description: The cuts that altogether number in the tens of thousands have made only a dent in the jobs that were added amid the pandemic.

entries.title: Genesis Demise Marks End of Era for Crypto's Pseudo-Banks
entries.description: The crypto-lending sector turned out to be poorly risk-managed, subjecting users to heavy losses after epic boom.

entries.title: Tesla Is Last Stronghold for Investors Buying the Dip in Tech Stocks
entries.description: Individual investors’ net purchases of a basket of eight popular tech stocks hit a recent peak in November, before dropping sharply through the end of the year. Buying has picked up slightly in the new year.

entries.title: Tesla's Price Cuts Put Pressure on Rivals
entries.description: The electric-vehicle maker’s decision to reduce prices has reverberated through the industry.
